channel.title: Galleries on Stork'Studios
channel.description: Recent content in Galleries on Stork'Studios

item.title: Bullet Waste
item.description: Combination of a first person slasher and a bullet hell, where you play as a mutated assasin with very high mobility.

item.title: FIGA Legend
item.description: Quick and simple fighting game for two, where characters are running automatically and players only control their combat actions, like punching, jumping or sliding.

item.title: Mediator: Back to the roots
item.description: Open world RPG created in 48h, focused on our favourite quests in that kind of games: gathering number of random items for NPCs.

item.title: Kappa Square
item.description: Singleplayer space shooter with full 3d mobility where you need to eliminate hostile soldiers, gather amunition and complete objectives to win.

item.title: Stork'man
item.description: 2d platformer game made using self-written game engine. It that was our first game created together.

item.title: Game Jam Projects
item.description: Various games created by our team during game jams. Their quality is highly irregular as we were experimenting with some new approaches each time we were going on a game jam.
